title.narrative: The cost of managing all implementing organisations’ delivery of the second phase of the programme.

description.narrative: This activity (The cost of managing all implementing organisations’ delivery of the second phase of the programme.) is a component of Girls Education Challenge (Phase II) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £39,779,778. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Education policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: PwC. The start date is 01-04-2017 and the end date is 31-03-2025.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Education - Social Affairs - Education - administration, policy and planning
Aid to civil society organisations / NGOs
